title: Password reset
content: If you forgot your password, use the Reset Password link on the login screen. Follow the email link and choose a new password.

title: Account locked
content: After too many failed logins, the account is locked for 15 minutes. You can also reset the password to unlock immediately.

title: Billing update
content: Update payment details in Settings > Billing. Changes take effect immediately on the next invoice.

title: Two-factor authentication
content: To update MFA, go to Settings > Security. Remove the old device and enroll a new authenticator app.

title: Service status
content: Check system status at status.example.com before reporting an incident. Planned maintenance appears there.

title: App crash on startup
content: If the app crashes on startup, reboot the device, reinstall the app, and collect the error code.

title: Integrations setup
content: Integrations are configured in Settings > Integrations. Create an API key and follow the provider setup guide.
